channel.title: Delta players cant connect even when i portforward
channel.description: guys im really worried about this i portforwarded and changed ip and stuff tested my server with my bro it worked for a COUPLE of days thats weird and when my bro went to log on it wont connect him i checked my portforwarding and it was correct plzz help me

item.title: Delta players cant connect even when i portforward
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

Also if that isn’t the case, your firewall could of detected that it was “dangerous” for your computer and took it off your exceptions list (this has happened to me before) Just check your firewall and make sure that it is still on there

Read full topic
item.source: Delta players cant connect even when i portforward

item.title: Delta players cant connect even when i portforward
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Most likely that is the cause. It’s because when you port forward you are forwarding the port to your local ip on your network. When the router is restarted it sometimes scrambles the local ips thus changing the local ip that your computer is (making port forwarding to the previous ip useless).

Read full topic
item.source: Delta players cant connect even when i portforward

item.title: Delta players cant connect even when i portforward
item.dc:creator: @knight60two knight60two
item.description:
@knight60two wrote:

Bryanc:

Have you recently restarted the router or computer?

every night i go to bed i turn off my wifi router and stuff does that have to anything with why it wont connect?

Read full topic
